### Bzlmod Snippet
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazelpods", version = "1.12.6")
```
## Workspace Snippet
```starlark
http_archive(
  name = "bazelpods",
  sha256 = "8234861f768180d23c9c6d8700f19dcf13063c3fc033cb7e8d5693bec1af8a2e",
  url = "https://github.com/sergiikhliustin/BazelPods/releases/download/1.12.6/release.tar.gz"
)
load("@bazelpods//:repositories.bzl", "bazelpods_dependencies")
bazelpods_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency ruby to v3.3.5 by @sergiikhliustin in https://github.com/sergiikhliustin/BazelPods/pull/179
* chore(deps): update dependency apple_support to v1.17.0 by @sergiikhliustin in https://github.com/sergiikhliustin/BazelPods/pull/180
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_ios to v5.1.0 by @sergiikhliustin in https://github.com/sergiikhliustin/BazelPods/pull/181
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_cc to v0.0.10 by @sergiikhliustin in https://github.com/sergiikhliustin/BazelPods/pull/182
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.3.2 by @sergiikhliustin in https://github.com/sergiikhliustin/BazelPods/pull/183

### Bzlmod Snippet

## Workspace Snippet
```starlark

  name = "bazelpods",
```

```starlark
)
load("@bazelpods//:repositories.bzl", "bazelpods_dependencies")
bazelpods_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.1.2 by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/141
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_xcodeproj to v2.3.1 by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/142
* Disable GIT_CLONE_PROTECTION_ACTIVE for Github actions by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/147
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_ios to v4.5.0 by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/145
* Bump rexml from 3.2.6 to 3.2.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/143
* Add support for compiler_flags and ability to override objc_copts, swift_copts, cc_copts and linkopts via user options by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/149


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/compare/1.12.1...1.12.2

## What's Changed
* Test and app specs base support by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/112
* Fix handling env variables in absolute paths (args and env) by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/114
* Add ability to override 'test_host' via --user-options by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/115
* Add ability to override 'timeout' via --user-options by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/116


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/compare/0.10.1...0.11.0

## What's Changed
* Add `--diff` command line option to Generator by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/46
* Code cleanup by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/47
* Reorganize targets and commands by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/48
* arm64sim subcommand by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/49
* Arm64sim command fixes by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/50


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/compare/0.8.1...0.9

## What's Changed
* Fix crash on version compare by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/40
* Put arm64 patched frameworks into a hidden directory to avoid conflicts with cocoapods by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/41
* Enable concurrency by default. Introduce `--no-concurrency` flag by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/42
* `missing_sdks` patch by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/43
* Ignore hidden files in podGlob unwrap by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/44
* Github workflows update by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/45


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/compare/0.8...0.8.1

## What's Changed
* Pre-analyze podspec before generating targets by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/24
* XCFrameworks unwrap patterns to paths by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/25
* XCFrameworks deep analysis by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/26
* PodDependenciesAnalyzer by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/27
* BuildSettingsAnalyzer; Root analyzer by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/28
* Improved command line options by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/29
* Improved target naming by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/30
* ObjcLibrary for empty or headersonly specs by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/31
* Reverted ObjcLibrary, fixed sources analyzing by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/32
* Patches mechanism, BundlesDeduplicate patch by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/33
* Improved `--user-options` support by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/34
* Add `--log-level` option by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/35
* Base osx platform setup by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/36
* Arm64 to sim patch by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/37
* New command line option `--patches` by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/38
* Pre release updates by @sergeykhliustin in https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/pull/39


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sergeykhliustin/BazelPods/compare/0.7.2...0.8
